mod2.js(4,1): error TS1203: Export assignment cannot be used when targeting ECMAScript modules. Consider using 'export default' or another module format instead.


==== mod2.js (1 errors) ====
    /** @typedef {number} Foo */
    const ns = {};
    ns.Foo = class {}
    module.exports = ns;
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS1203: Export assignment cannot be used when targeting ECMAScript modules. Consider using 'export default' or another module format instead.
